class.name: Bullet
class.brief_description: A Node2D representing a controllable bullet.
class.description: A Node2D representing a controllable bullet. It does no processing of its own, so it must be controlled by a [BulletServer] or script. Collision detection is handled manually. All collision detection in qurobullet is acheived by running [code]intersect_shape[/code] on a [Physics2DDirectSpaceState] using collision data included in bullet's type.

method.name: spawn
method.description: Spawn bullet of [code]type[/code] at [code]position[/code], headed in [code]direction[/code]. Also sets [code]active[/code] to [code]true[/code] and resets its lifetime.

method.name: update_position
method.description: Moves the bullet to its next position, based on its direction, bullet type, and lifetime. Also updates the bullet's lifetime by delta.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], bullet is considered "live". Automatically sets object visibility to match state when changed.
